ThingDef.label: specialty flour
ThingDef.description:
A finely ground powder made from non-wheat sources such as nuts, seeds, or alternative grains. These flours bring unique flavors and textures to baking and cooking, offering versatile options for a wide range of culinary creations.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 5 specialty flour requires 50 ingredients with an average value of 1.1, for a total value of 55, and sells for 27, giving a <color=#33CC33>59.26%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 4000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.03</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>27</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.77</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: chips
ThingDef.description:
A variety of crunchy, flavorful bites made from seeds and thinly sliced, dried, or fried produce. These nutrient-packed treats offer a satisfying crunch and can be seasoned or flavored to suit any taste.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 bags of chips or seeds requires 10 ingredients with an average value of 1.1 for a total value of 11, and sells for 3, giving a <color=#33CC33>63.33%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 250 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.12</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>60</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.18</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: puree
ThingDef.description:
A smooth, thick blend made by processing fruits, vegetables, or legumes into a creamy consistency. Purees are used in cooking to create sauces, soups, or as a base for various dishes, adding texture and concentrated flavor.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 30 puree requires 100 produce with an average value of 1.1, for a total value of 110, and sells for 10, giving a <color=#33CC33>63.33%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 1250 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.24</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>100</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.59</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: gravy
ThingDef.description:
A rich, savory sauce made by combining meat drippings with flavorful stock, thickened for a smooth texture and bold flavor.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 50 gravy requires 125 raw meat with an average value of 2, for a total value of 250, and sells for 9.50, giving a <color=#33CC33>47.37%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 7500 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.06</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>190</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Hard to estimate, as it depends on the source of meat the colony has.

ThingDef.label: powdered horn
ThingDef.description:
A fine, pale dust ground from tough keratin or crystalline animal horns. Traditionally valued for its supposed vitality-boosting qualities, in reality it is completely useless but tradition, superstition, and stubborn persistence keep it in demand.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 25 powdered horn requires an animal horn for a total value of 800 (assuming Thrumbo horns, other horns produce more or less powder depending on market value), and sells for 48, giving a <color=#33CC33>33.33%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 5000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.24</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.2 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>240</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Profit per day is hard to estimate, as it depends on how many horns you can produce from hunting.

ThingDef.label: powdered mineral
ThingDef.description:
Powdered mineral is finely ground metal, produced from gold, silver, steel, and other ores. While it lacks practical applications, it is valued as a trade good, often prized for its rarity, sheen, or symbolic worth in various cultural exchanges.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 5 powdered mineral requires 15 minerals for a total value of 28.5 (assuming steel, other minerals will adjust recupe yield depending on their market value), and sells for 15, giving a <color=#33CC33>62%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 5000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.02</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>500</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Profit per day is hard to estimate, as it depends on how much mineral you can mine.
